newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss bonds close firm but lag Bunds, Treasuries.
newsitem.headline: Swiss bonds close firm but lag Bunds, Treasuries.

text.p: 1525 GMT - Swiss bonds ended firm, but were seen lagging behind the gains in other bond markets. Traders said one large bank was seen selling, possibly in connection with new issues.
* June Conf futures end up nine basis points at 120.38
* 4-1/2 June 2007 bond yields 3.475 pct vs 3.484 pct.
